name: safety-delta-delta
description: Chart for exploring changes over time across multiple measures in clinical trial safety data
author: Rho, Inc.

scripts.build: npm audit fix && npm run bundle && npm run format
scripts.build-offline: npm run bundle && npm run format
scripts.build-all: npm audit fix && npm run bundle && npm run format && npm run build-wiki && npm run check-settings-schema
scripts.build-wiki: npm run build-configuration-wiki && npm run build-data-guidelines-wiki
scripts.format: npm run format-src && npm run format-bundle
scripts.test-page: start chrome ./test-page/index.html && start firefox ./test-page/index.html && start iexplore file://%CD%/test-page/index.html
